title: Cheesy Chicken Meatballs
notes: Meatballs are kinda lame, should add an egg for richness.  Pasta that goes with this makes way too much pasta
ingredients: 60g (or ~6 tablespoons) panko (or gluten free bread crumbs)
instructions: Add all the ingredients for the chicken meatballs to a large bowl. Thoroughly mix together, then form meatballs.  Note: lean ground meat tends to be very sticky so I like to spray my hands with a little olive oil while rolling the meatballs  so they are easier to make.
Place the meatballs on a baking tray lined with parchment paper and make sure they have space.
Bake in the oven for NO MORE than 12 minutes.  I bake mine for 8 â€“ 10 minutes at 420F.  Set aside once finished.
